Interface PersonRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Person,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Person,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Person,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Person,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Person,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Person>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Person,Integer>
public interface PersonRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Person,Integer>

Person Repository

Data access layer for person entities. Provides methods to retrieve person data with dynamic projection support and specialized queries for addresses, banking, and education information.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Jakub Pavlíček

    • findAddressesByPersonId

      @Query("SELECT new com.stag.identity.person.repository.projection.AddressView(\n p.street,\n p.streetNumber,\n p.domicileZipCode,\n CAST(p.domicileMunicipalityPartId AS Long),\n CAST(p.domicileCountryId AS Integer),\n\n p.temporaryStreet,\n p.temporaryStreetNumber,\n p.temporaryZipCode,\n CAST(p.temporaryMunicipalityPartId AS Long),\n CAST(p.temporaryCountryId AS Integer),\n\n p.zipCodeForeign,\n p.municipalityForeign,\n p.districtForeign,\n p.postOfficeForeign,\n\n p.temporaryZipCodeForeign,\n p.temporaryMunicipalityForeign,\n p.temporaryDistrictForeign,\n p.temporaryPostOfficeForeign\n)\nFROM\n Person p\nWHERE\n p.id = :personId\n") Optional<AddressView> findAddressesByPersonId(Integer personId)
      Finds comprehensive address data for a person including domicile, temporary, and foreign addresses.
      Parameters:
      personId - the person identifier
      Returns:
      optional address view with all address types

    • findBankingByPersonId

      @Query("SELECT new com.stag.identity.person.repository.projection.BankView(\n p.accountHolder,\n p.accountAddress,\n p.accountPrefix,\n p.accountSuffix,\n p.bankCode,\n p.accountIban,\n p.accountCurrency,\n\n p.euroAccountHolder,\n p.euroAccountAddress,\n p.euroAccountPrefix,\n p.euroAccountSuffix,\n p.euroBankCode,\n p.euroAccountIban,\n p.euroAccountCurrency,\n CAST(p.euroAccountCountryId AS Integer),\n p.euroAccountSwiftCode\n)\nFROM\n Person p\nWHERE\n p.id = :personId\n") Optional<BankView> findBankingByPersonId(Integer personId)
      Finds banking information for a person including standard and Euro accounts.
      Parameters:
      personId - the person identifier
      Returns:
      optional bank view with account details

    • findEducationByPersonId

      @Query("SELECT new com.stag.identity.person.repository.projection.EducationView(\n p.highSchoolId,\n p.highSchoolFieldOfStudyNumber,\n CAST(p.highSchoolCountryId AS Integer),\n p.graduationDate,\n\n p.highSchoolForeign,\n p.highSchoolForeignPlace,\n p.highSchoolForeignFieldOfStudy\n)\nFROM\n Person p\nWHERE\n p.id = :personId\n") Optional<EducationView> findEducationByPersonId(Integer personId)
      Finds education information for a person including high school details and field of study.
      Parameters:
      personId - the person identifier
      Returns:
      optional education view with school information
